changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create index if not exists for (n:relationship) on (n.nanoid)

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create index if not exists for (n:property) on (n.nanoid)

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create index if not exists for (n:value_set) on (n.nanoid)

changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create index if not exists for (n:term) on (n.nanoid)

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create index if not exists for (n:origin) on (n.nanoid)

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create index if not exists for (n:tag) on (n.key, n.value)

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create fulltext index termDefn for (t:term) on each [t.origin_definition]

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create fulltext index termValue for (t:term) on each [t.value]

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create fulltext index termValueDefn for (t:term) on each [t.value, t.origin_defintion]

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create fulltext index tagKeyValue for (g:tag) on each [g.key, g.value]

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create fulltext index nodeHandle for (n:node) on each [n.handle]

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create fulltext index edgeHandle for (n:relationship) on each [n.handle]

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: create fulltext index propHandle for (n:property) on each [n.handle]

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: call apoc.trigger.add('add-nanoid-property', 'UNWIND $createdNodes AS node WITH node, labels(node)[0] as label WHERE label in ["node", "relationship", "property", "value_set", "concept", "predicate", "term", "origin", "model", "tag"] WHERE NOT exists(node.nanoid) SET node.nanoid = apoc.text.random(6, "abcdefghijkmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHJKMNPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789")', {phase: "afterAsync"})

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CREATE CONSTRAINT node_unique_attrs IF NOT EXISTS FOR (n:node) REQUIRE (n.model, n.handle) IS UNIQUE

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CREATE CONSTRAINT property_unique_attrs IF NOT EXISTS FOR (p:property) REQUIRE (p.model, p.handle, p.desc) IS UNIQUE

changeSet.author: Nelson
changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CREATE CONSTRAINT term_unique_attrs IF NOT EXISTS FOR (t:term) REQUIRE (t.origin_name, t.origin_id, t.origin_version) IS UNIQUE
